resources.string: In the overwhelming and non-ecofriendly world, high emission of greenhouse gases are leading to global warming, melting of ice glaciers, and several disastrous events.
Climate change, has become a major concern for the sustenance of life on the Planet Earth.​\n Greenhouse gases can trap heat in the atmosphere and are impacting climate change.
Carbon footprint, the amount of greenhouse gases emitted by us each year, helps us in evaluating the our impact on the world. ​
Let’s Make our Carbon Footprint Greener
Earn points for the good deeds you do like going by walk, cycling, using public transport!
Selfie Time! \n Share a pic of you planting a tree and earn 30 GreenPoints for every tree planted!!
More Trees = \n More Green points \n = More happiness!!
The more you drive… the more CO 2 you emit… The more number of monster that come up!!
Oceans are the prerequisite and home of hundreds of kinds of aquatic life! Presently, the aquatic ecosystem is being disturbed and organisms are being endangered!​
Let\'s all assmble to stop pollution and use this as a solution to stop pollution or else... it\'s the next ENDGAME!!!
Please GRANT permissions so we can start to earn points!!!
Need your permission to recognise your activity, like walking, running, going by vehicle, etc. so that we can start calculating distance so you can earn points!
Need your permission to access your location for calculating distance for your points
Need your permission to access your background location in order to calculate your distance even in the background!
Need your permission to read your storage so that you can upload photos as profile pic and upload you doing good deeds to earn points!
Wait for a moment while quickly fetch your data!
